title: Disk Space Recovery
description: Archive/remove C:\oldWSL, UbuntuBackup.tar, clean Temp folder, remove orphaned hex-named folders at C:\ root. Could recover significant GBs.
close_reason: Project pivot: shifting from cleanup/optimization to fresh install preparation. These tasks are obsolete.

title: BIOS & Driver Research
description: Research available updates for motherboard BIOS, chipset drivers, storage controllers, and network adapters. Document current vs available versions in inventory/bios-research.md and inventory/driver-versions.md

title: Hardware Inventory Collection
description: Gather complete hardware inventory: motherboard/BIOS, CPU, GPU, storage devices, RAM, network adapters, audio devices. Export to inventory/hardware-inventory.md

title: Data Migration Planning
description: Identify what data/settings to migrate vs reinstall fresh. Document in inventory/migration-checklist.md. Key items: code repos, SSH keys, browser profiles, application settings.

title: Legacy Tool Cleanup
description: Remove VS 2010/2012 schemas, clean SQL 2019 tools from PATH (using 2022), uninstall unused trading apps, clean Chocolatey cruft (old KB patches).
close_reason: Project pivot: shifting from cleanup/optimization to fresh install preparation. These tasks are obsolete.

title: Create Pre-Cleanup Backups
description: Export current USER PATH, export all environment variables, document current state before any modifications. Safety protocol requirement.

title: PATH Analysis & Deduplication
description: Validate all PATH entries exist, remove duplicates (Python312, .dotnet/tools, cursor, .local/bin each appear twice). Quick win, low risk.
close_reason: Project pivot: shifting from cleanup/optimization to fresh install preparation. These tasks are obsolete.

title: API Key Security Hardening
description: Exposed API keys in env vars: BWS_ACCESS_TOKEN, GEMINI_API_KEY, OPENAI_API_KEY, sjh_api_key, sjh_app_secret. Migrate to BWS, rotate if compromised, remove from env vars.
close_reason: Project pivot: shifting from cleanup/optimization to fresh install preparation. These tasks are obsolete.

title: Pre-Install Verification
description: Verify hardware health before fresh install: disk SMART status, memory diagnostics, backup verification. Create inventory/pre-install-checklist.md

title: Fresh Windows Install - Hardware Inventory & Migration Prep
description: Prepare for fresh Windows installation by inventorying hardware components, researching BIOS/driver updates, and planning data migration. Focus on documentation and research before any system changes. Migration will be selective - reinstalling dev tools fresh rather than file-by-file migration.

title: Python Installation Consolidation
description: Multiple Python installs found: C:\Python312 (root), user local, Chocolatey versions. Consolidate to single canonical location. Medium risk - verify scripts first.
close_reason: Project pivot: shifting from cleanup/optimization to fresh install preparation. These tasks are obsolete.
